name: Highway Road trip Destruction: Super Cars Crash
name_original: Highway Road trip Destruction: Super Cars Crash
description:
Super Cars Crash is the crazy chain reaction game that has already had millions and millions of levels played since it was introduced early this year. Come join the fun!

• Simple Objective: "Crash" all supercars with a limited # of taps
• Full Retina & iPhone 5 support!
• New PowerUps! will help you get through the hard levels!
• FREE Tips EVERY DAY!

Can you go all the way? Come join the fun
